html:
Role Voice type Premiere Cast, 24 October 1819
(Conductor: Gioachino Rossini)
Elena (Ellen),
Lady of the Lake 		soprano
Malcom (Malcolm) Groeme (Graeme),
Rebel chieftain, Elena's lover (en travesti) 		contralto
Uberto di Snowdon, alias of Giacomo V, Re di Scozia (King James V of Scotland)

Enamoured of Elena

tenor
Duglas (Douglas) d'Angus,
Elena's father, rebel and former tutor to King James 		bass
Rodrigo (Roderick) di Dhu,
Rebel chief of the Highlanders, betrothed to Elena 		tenor
Serano,
Douglas's retainer 		tenor
Albina,
Elena's confidante 		mezzo-soprano
Bertram,
Servant to the King 		bass
Chorus: Pastori, Pastorelle scozzesi, Bardi, Grandi di Scozia, Dame scozzesi, Guerrieri del Clan Alpino, Cacciatori, Guardie reali
Scottish shepherds and shepherdesses, bards, Scottish nobles and their ladies, Highland warriors, hunters, royal guards
